SERVICES

Suppliers Selection:

Selection of reliable and best fit manufacturers on the basis of the following Criteria:

  • Value for money
  • Financial strength
  • Technical abilities
  • Human expertise
  • Reputation

Merchandising:

  • Gather information regarding new product developments and technical innovation in the market
  • Negotiation of the best and competitive prices
  • Updating you on the status of your orders
    Follow-up of development samples and pre-production samples
  • Implementation and adherence of customer’s specifications, etc.

Quality Control:

  • Evaluate suppliers for quality standards and procedures
  • Evaluate first samples and recurring WIP checks
  • Monitor and ensure that laboratory test results provided by suppliers meet the client’s needs
  • Pre Shipment Inspections and reporting is carried out on every shipment supported with digital pictures

Deliveries and Shipping:

  • Close monitoring of all consignments at factories for timely shipments
  • Coordinate between supplier and shipping companies to gain the fastest shipping lead times
  • Ensuring that suppliers expedite and process shipping documents on time
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
